import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardActions, CardContent, CardMedia, Button, Typography } from '@material-ui/core'; import DeleteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Delete'; import MoreHorizIcon from '@material-ui/icons/MoreHoriz'; import ThumbUpAltIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ThumbUpAlt'; import moment from 'moment' import useStyles from './styles' import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import { deletePost, likePost } from '../../../actions/posts'; const Post = ({post, setCurrentId}) => { const classes = useStyles() const dispatch = useDispatch(); return (
{post.creator} {moment(post.createdAt).fromNow()}
{post.tags.map((tag) => `#${tag} `)}
{post.title} {post.message} ) } export default Post
